PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: servants to the Countess of Rousillon.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: COUNTESS OF ROUSILLON, mother to Bertram.
HELENA, a gentlewoman protected by the Countess.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: neighbours and friends to the Widow.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BERTRAM, the COUNTESS of Rousillon, HELENA,
and LAFEU, all in black

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Paris. The KING's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish of cornets. Enter the KING of France,
with letters, and divers Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE I. Paris. The KING's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish of cornets. Enter the KING, attended
with divers young Lords taking leave for the
Florentine war; BERTRAM, and PAROLLES
Re-enter KING. BERTRAM and PAROLLES retire

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE III. Paris. The KING's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING, HELENA, and Attendants. LAFEU and
PAROLLES retire
Exeunt all but LAFEU and PAROLLES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Paris. The KING's palace.
SCENE V. Paris. The KING's palace.
SCENE I. Florence. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter the DUKE of Florence attended;
the two Frenchmen, with a troop of soldiers.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE III. Florence. Before the DUKE's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter the DUKE of Florence, BERTRAM,
PAROLLES, Soldiers, Drum, and Trumpets

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE V. Florence. Without the walls. A tucket afar off.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter an old Widow of Florence, DIANA, VIOLENTA,
and MARIANA, with other Citizens

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Widow
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter HELENA, disguised like a Pilgrim

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Widow
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter BERTRAM, PAROLLES, and the whole army

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Camp before Florence.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BERTRAM and the two French Lords

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Florence. The Widow's house.
SCENE I. Without the Florentine camp.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter Second French Lord, with five or six other
Soldiers in ambush
Exit, with PAROLLES guarded. A short alarum within

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Florence. The Widow's house.
SCENE III. The Florentine camp.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the two French Lords and some two or three Soldiers
Enter PAROLLES guarded, and First Soldier

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Florence. The Widow's house.
SCENE V. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE I. Marseilles. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter HELENA, Widow, and DIANA, with two
Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Rousillon. Before the COUNT's palace.
SCENE III. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING, COUNTESS, LAFEU, the two
French Lords, with Attendants
